instance.context:
Lamps swung
above their heads , red and green and white in the warm darkness .

By placing a disc of hard-wearing ` Ceran "
above the burner , we have created a gas hotplate with the streamlined looks and the easy-clean surfaces that you have demanded .

When her mind 's eye tired of the ghosts of memory , her gaze skipped
above her bed to the ethereal mobiles whose charm was always changing .

It , too , was nearly dead , but he was persuaded to release it in a bay long enough for it to be filmed with an underwater camera as it swam slowly
above the bottom .

Halfway up the street she paused to look
above the church to the hill beyond .

Look
above the shop fronts to the upper floors above nos. 33-45 St. Giles Street .

The bus stopped sharply as the driver heard the footsteps
above him and listened .

Sometimes the agent and his family lived
above the station , so that offices and home together formed a rather grander two-storey building .

Crystal chandeliers glittered brightly
above a marble floor ; a quartet of musicians played music -- real music , Nicolo thought , incongruously , not the brain-frying stuff they 'd played during the fashion show .

The hills
above Kardameli are a good place in which to loosen up .

It is a low rising hill
above the waters of a loch and on it centre powers that only eagles of peace and truth can fully feel

Detective Chief Superintendent Wycliffe and his wife , Helen , were to see the spectacle for the first time ; they were spending a long weekend with the Ballards , who lived on the moor
above the town .

There is the nineteenth- century villa , perched on a cliff
above Monte Carlo which he has just finished restoring .

Where the road bears left continue straight on to pick up the coast path
above Caerbwdy Bay -- look out for the purple sandstone around the bay .

Jadeite artefacts were prized
above all for their symbolic roles .

Essentially this is big-hall playing , and those who prize the French repertoire
above all for its intimacy and charm may feel short-changed .

And not only were women put to the sword but the heads of those guilty of child murder were nailed
above the gallows .

For safety , make sure any pictures you fix
above your bed are secure .

Omally craned his neck
above the crowd and peered towards the sinister contrivance .

Later , as we took our leave , I told Ras Tafari how I longed
above all to return to his country .

The shoots were pushing their heads
above the ground even though the group was still able to claim record profits as late as January of this year .

She arched her back , tried to stretch her neck
above assorted flesh and hair and smell .

She swung her arms
above her head and cracked her hand on a low beam .
